extendedInfo.description: Featured in book "Best Android Apps"!Are you a busy realtor or a bank officer or simply out for a home or car? Use this handy tool for regular, bi-weekly, Yearly, Interest Only, Balloon, Canadian, FHA, VA, USDA, Weekly, Semi-Monthly loans.You can email, export Amortization! Graphically see you payoff your mortgage! Also find out what happens if you prepay!Refinance? Not a problem. See if it is worth it to do a Refinance and when you can recover the refinance charges.Find how much you can afford and whether to go for 15 or 30 year from the Estimator option! All the above features of the top loan calculator app "Mortgage Calculator Pro", PLUS- Save unlimited profiles- More loan types- News & Rates from Bankrate- Custom startup- US possible tax deductions- Enhanced Prepayment (Combinations of prepayments at the same time. See the savings in Amortization page.)- Help included in About screen.Issues? Or any need to update any of the rates showing up in the app because of recent regulatory changes? Please email Dev.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I have used this Mortgage Calculator Full app for years and it is by far the BEST!  As a Realtor, I use it every day.. I would be lost without it!
reviews.author: Liz Young

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Must have application. I use this application For knowing if people are trying to cheat me. Morgages and car loans. Good decision maker tool
reviews.author: John Alberti

reviews.title: Works good
reviews.comment: A must have for a new home buyer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Additional payments doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Figuring out how to use this function is virtually hidden.  The amortisa tion worked for the first added payment option, but only if I used the \'NEXT\' option going through field by field.  Adding other variables for added repayments just gave me junk.  Waste of money, as the added payments was my only reason to buy the app.
reviews.author: Ian Pipe

reviews.title: It doesn\'t feet my screen correctly
reviews.comment: Still the same. Debt to income ... doesn\'t show correctly in my screen!  I cant see the numbers?! Also perhaps you should add insurance and property tax and mortgage insurance and hoa fee as well.
reviews.author: Ali Naimi

reviews.comment: Works great! Either gets you close, or exact on your mortgage payment when buying a home. You only need basic information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Sometimes the MIP does not calculate. Came back to the app to look for updates hoping to fix the issue. Otherwise when it works it delivers a payment very close to reality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: By far the best!!!
reviews.comment: By far the best!!! I have used apps from Android to Apple and nothing compares to the ease of use and complete functionality. Spend the 3.99 and be done looking for Mortgage calculators forever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app!!!
reviews.comment: Must have if your in the Mortgage or Real Estate business. I\'m a Mona officer and been looking for an app that includes MIP, taxes, Hazard insurance in percentages.  Look no further this is it. Worth the $4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great and easy app
reviews.comment: Love the speed and accuracy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Free version does the same.not worth it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Stars!
reviews.comment: Great app for Realtors and loan officers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for Loan Officers!
reviews.comment: I love this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: One fixed needed is with USDA loans. There is now an annual .3% Guarantee Fee. The upfront Guarantee Fee was reduced to 2%.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Does what u would expect a mortgage calculator to do..... Well!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but. Could  be better
reviews.comment: Estimate:  top of input numbers missing, bug.   Consider tapping last blank field to calculate instead of having to select what we are solving for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app but can\'t do bi weekly amortization.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Works great!

reviews.comment: Works well. Very good service from vendor
